mapper.select: select a.audit_id,v.vendor_name,a.audit_comp_date,a.audit_kind_Id,ak.audit_kind, a.audit_result,a.auditor_id,m.member_name from audit_info a, vendor_info v, audit_kind ak, member_info m where a.vendor_id=v.vendor_id and a.audit_kind_Id=ak.audit_kind_id and a.auditor_id=m.member_id and v.vendor_name like '%'||#{vendorName}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into ncr_info values((select count(*)from ncr_info)+1,#{audit_id},#{issuer_id}, sysdate,null,'N',#{ncr_title},#{ncr_description},#{ncr_grade_id})
INSERT INTO ncr_attach values((select count(*)from ncr_info),(select count(*)from ncr_attach)+1, #{originalfileName}, #{saveFileName},#{fileSize})
mapper.select: select vendor_id,vendor_name from vendor_info where vendor_name like '%'||#{vendor_name}||'%'
select distinct n.issuer_id,m.member_name as issuer_name from ncr_info n, member_info m where m.member_id=n.issuer_id and m.member_name like '%'||#{isuer_name}||'%'

select n.ncr_id, n.audit_id,v.vendor_name,a.audit_comp_date,a.audit_kind_id,ak.audit_kind,a.audit_result ,n.ncr_title,m.member_name as issuer_name,n.ncr_description,n.ncr_grade_id,n.ncr_comp from audit_info a, member_info m, ncr_info n, audit_kind ak, vendor_info v where n.audit_id = a.audit_id and a.audit_kind_id = ak.audit_kind_id and m.member_id=n.issuer_id and a.vendor_id = v.vendor_id and ncr_id=#{ncr_id}
mapper.update: update ncr_info set ncr_comp='Y' ,ncr_comp_date= sysdate where ncr_id=#{ncr_id}
mapper.insert: insert into ncr_reply values(#{ncr_id},(select count(*)from ncr_reply)+1,sysdate,#{replier_id}, #{reply_description},'VENDOR')
INSERT INTO reply_attach values((select count(*)from ncr_reply),(select count(*)from reply_attach)+1, #{originalfileName}, #{saveFileName},#{fileSize},#{ncr_id})
mapper.select: select r.ncr_id,r.reply_id,r.replier_id,m.member_name as replier_name,r.reply_date,r.reply_description,r.reply_from from ncr_reply r, member_info m where m.member_id=r.replier_id and ncr_id= #{ncr_id} order by reply_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into ncr_reply values(#{ncr_id},(select count(*)from ncr_reply)+1,sysdate,#{replier_id}, #{reply_description},'AUDITOR')
mapper.select: select count(*) from(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,V.VENDOR_NAME, V.VENDOR_ADDRESS,V.VENDOR_ID, V.AUDIT_RESULT, P.PRODUCT_NAME,V.VENDOR_Q_NAME,V.VENDOR_Q_TEL, V.VENDOR_S_NAME,V.VENDOR_S_TEL, V.AUDIT_NEXT_DATE,A.AUDIT_PLAN_DATE,A.AUDIT_ID FROM VENDOR_INFO V ,(SELECT * FROM AUDIT_INFO WHERE AUDIT_PLAN_DATE IS NULL OR AUDITOR_ID IS NULL) A, PRODUCT_ITEM P WHERE V.VENDOR_ID = A.VENDOR_ID AND V.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID AND V.AUDIT_NEXT_DATE IS NULL OR V.AUDIT_NEXT_DATE <= TO_DATE(SYSDATE+30))

select count(*)from (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,AU.AUDIT_ID,V.VENDOR_NAME, V.VENDOR_ID,C.CATEGORY_NAME, V.VENDOR_ADDRESS,P.PRODUCT_NAME,P.PRODUCT_ID,Au.AUDIT_PLAN_DATE,Au.AUDIT_KIND_ID,M. MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_ID FROM VENDOR_INFO V, PRODUCT_ITEM P, AUDIT_INFO AU, MEMBER_INFO M, CATEGORY_INFO C WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = AU.AUDITOR_ID AND V.VENDOR_ID =AU.VENDOR_ID AND P.PRODUCT_ID = V.PRODUCT_ID AND P.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID AND AU.AUDIT_PLAN_DATE IS NOT NULL and au.audit_id not in (select audit_id from audit_result))
select count(*) from ncr_info where ncr_comp = 'N'

select n.ncr_id, n.audit_id ,a.vendor_id ,v.vendor_name ,n.ncr_title,n.ncr_description,m.member_name as issuer_name from ncr_info n, audit_info a,vendor_info v,member_info m where n.audit_id = a.audit_id and a.vendor_id=v.vendor_id and n.issuer_id=m.member_id and n.ncr_comp='N' order by ncr_id
